name: Boucle Pouffe with Fringe - White
description: The Boucle Pouffe with Fringe is a statement piece with a nod to mid-century design. The Pouffe is upholstered in our signature off-white bouclé fabric and features a maximalist twist in the form of bullion fringing. The pouffe is the perfect way to incorporate the playful fringe trend. Ideal for those looking to add an intentional layer of dimension and movement to their design. The versatile piece can be used as a stool or as a cosy footrest. Manufactured in the UK.
